level.text: Claimants receiving indemnity compensation for TTD, PTD, LWEC, or death benefits under this chapter shall receive cost-of-living increases whenever a cost-of-living adjustment (COLA) is awarded to District employees pursuant to D.C. Official Code §§ 1-611.05 and 1-611.06 (2006 Repl. & 2012 Supp.).
The percentage amount and effective date of the COLA shall be the same as for any COLA granted under those sections of the Code.

Source: Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 28 DCR 2307 (May 22, 1981); as amended by Notice of Emergency and Proposed Rulemaking published at 57 DCR 9540 (October 8, 2010)[EXPIRED]; as amended by Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 57 DCR 12224, 12232 (December 24, 2010); repealed and replaced by Final Rulemaking published at 59 DCR 8766, 8783 (July 27, 2012).
